attributes.comment:
SEE ATTACHED PDF OF RESPONSES.
CMS-0058-NC

andros' comment and suggestions as related to CMS-0058-NC, establishment of National Directory of Healthcare Providers & Services (NDH).

At andros, we are building the nation’s richest resource of provider data to digitally transform the payor-provider relationship. Like the coral reef that inspired our name, provider data ecosystems require diversity and balance to thrive. We use millions of data points to form a complete vision of the provider landscape, which enables us to find utility and meaning in this diverse ecosystem of information. We’re committed to providing industry-leading technology, expertise, and intelligent data that helps healthcare organizations ensure access to quality care for their members with strong, balanced and more diverse provider ecosystems.
